title: Component attribution in traces
description:

1. Added ComponentType enum to packages/shared/src/types/trace.ts with types: prompt, retrieval, tool, reasoning, planning, memory, routing, other

3. Updated ClickHouse schema (clickhouse-init.sql, 001_initial_schema.sql) with component_type column and index

   - Two materialized views: component_score_stats_mv and component_performance_mv

5. Added SDK tracing helpers (packages/sdk/src/tracing/index.ts):
   - retrieval(), reasoning(), planning(), prompt(), routing() span helpers
   - Updated generation() and tool() to support componentType option

All acceptance criteria met:
- Spans can be tagged with component type ✓
- Scores can be attributed to specific components ✓
- ClickHouse schema updated for component queries ✓
